definition: of or relating to or characteristic of the continents and islands of the Americas, a person from America or of American descent
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of the continents and islands of the Americas
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of the continents and islands of the Americas
- of or relating to the United States of America or its people or language or culture
= example: of or relating to the United States of America or its people or language or culture
noun
- a person from America or of American descent
= example: a person from America or of American descent
